verses.verse: שִׁ֖יר <S%H7892><s%> shir A Song מִזְמ֣וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor [or] Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. of David נָכ֣וֹן <S%H3559><s%> na-Chon is fixed לִבִּ֣י <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi my heart אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; O God אָשִׁ֥ירָה <S%H7891><s%> 'a-Shi-rah I will sing וַ֝אֲזַמְּרָ֗ה <S%H2167><s%> va-'a-zam-me-Rah, and give praise אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- even כְּבוֹדִֽי׃ <S%H3519><s%> ke-vo-Di. even with my glory

ע֭וּרָֽה <S%H5782><s%> 'U-rah Awake הַנֵּ֥בֶל <S%H5035><s%> han-Ne-vel psaltery וְכִנּ֗וֹר <S%H3658><s%> ve-chin-Nor, and harp אָעִ֥ירָה <S%H5782><s%> 'a-'I-rah I [myself] will awake שָּֽׁחַר׃ <S%H7837><s%> Sha-char. early

אוֹדְךָ֖ <S%H3034><s%> 'od-Cha I will praise בָעַמִּ֥ים׀ <S%H5971><s%> va-'am-Mim among the people יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; thee O LORD וַ֝אֲזַמֶּרְךָ֗ <S%H2167><s%> va-'a-zam-mer-cha, and I will sing praises בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- among אֻמִּֽים׃ <S%H3816><s%> 'um-Mim. unto thee among the nations

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for גָד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol [is] great מֵֽעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> me-'al- and שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim above the heavens חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2617><s%> chas-De-cha; For thy mercy וְֽעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- to שְׁחָקִ֥ים <S%H7834><s%> she-cha-Kim [reacheth] unto the clouds אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H571><s%> 'a-mit-Te-cha. and thy truth

ר֣וּמָה <S%H7311><s%> Ru-mah Be thou exalted עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- above שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim above the heavens אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; O God וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz above all the earth כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3519><s%> ke-vo-De-cha. and thy glory

לְ֭מַעַן <S%H4616><s%> Le-ma-'an because of יֵחָלְצ֣וּן <S%H2502><s%> ye-chal-Tzun may be delivered יְדִידֶ֑יךָ <S%H3039><s%> ye-di-Dei-cha; That thy beloved הוֹשִׁ֖יעָה <S%H3467><s%> ho-Shi-'ah save יְמִֽינְךָ֣ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-ne-Cha [with] thy right hand וַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <S%H6030><s%> va-'a-Ne-ni. and answer

אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber hath spoken בְּקָדְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H6944><s%> be-ka-de-Sho, in his holiness אֶעְלֹ֥זָה <S%H5937><s%> 'e'-Lo-zah I will rejoice אֲחַלְּקָ֥ה <S%H2505><s%> 'a-chal-le-Kah I will divide שְׁכֶ֑ם <S%H7927><s%> she-Chem; Shechem וְעֵ֖מֶק <S%H6010><s%> ve-'E-mek the valley סֻכּ֣וֹת <S%H5523><s%> suk-Kot of Succoth אֲמַדֵּֽד׃ <S%H4058><s%> 'a-mad-Ded. and mete out

לִ֤י li גִלְעָ֨ד׀ <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad Gilead לִ֤י li מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh, [is] mine Manasseh וְ֭אֶפְרַיִם <S%H669><s%> Ve-'ef-ra-yim [is] mine Ephraim מָע֣וֹז <S%H4581><s%> ma-'oz also [is] the strength רֹאשִׁ֑י <S%H7218><s%> ro-Shi; of mine head יְ֝הוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, Judah מְחֹקְקִֽי׃ <S%H2710><s%> me-cho-ke-Ki. [is] my lawgiver

מוֹאָ֤ב׀ <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av Moab סִ֬יר <S%H5518><s%> sir caldron רַחְצִ֗י <S%H7366><s%> rach-Tzi, is My washbowl עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- Over אֱ֭דוֹם <S%H123><s%> 'E-dom over Edom אַשְׁלִ֣יךְ <S%H7993><s%> 'ash-Lich will I cast out נַעֲלִ֑י <S%H5275><s%> na-'a-Li; my shoe עֲלֵֽי־ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei- Over פְ֝לֶ֗שֶׁת <S%H6429><s%> fe-Le-shet, over Philistia אֶתְרוֹעָֽע׃ <S%H7321><s%> et-ro-'A'. will I triumph

מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who יֹ֭בִלֵנִי <S%H2986><s%> Yoi-le-ni Who will bring עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> 'ir Ai מִבְצָ֑ר <S%H4013><s%> miv-Tzar; me into the strong מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who נָחַ֣נִי <S%H5148><s%> na-Cha-ni will lead עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against אֱדֽוֹם׃ <S%H123><s%> e-Dom. Edom

הֲלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ha-lo- O אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him [Wilt] not [thou] O God זְנַחְתָּ֑נוּ <S%H2186><s%> ze-nach-Ta-nu; [who] hast cast us off וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not תֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> te-Tze go forth אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, ;and wilt not thou O God בְּצִבְאֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H6635><s%> be-tziv-'o-Tei-nu. our armies

הָֽבָה־ <S%H3051><s%> ha-vah- Give לָּ֣נוּ La-nu עֶזְרָ֣ת <S%H5833><s%> 'ez-Rat us help מִצָּ֑ר <S%H6862><s%> mitz-Tzar; from trouble וְ֝שָׁ֗וְא <S%H7723><s%> ve-Shav, for vain תְּשׁוּעַ֥ת <S%H8668><s%> te-shu-'At [is] the help אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam. of man

בֵּֽאלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> be-lo-Him Through God נַעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> na-'a-seh- we shall do חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil; valiantly וְ֝ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu, who יָב֥וּס <S%H947><s%> ya-Vus for he [it is that] shall tread down צָרֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H6862><s%> tza-Rei-nu. our enemies
